Package cat.nyaa.nyaacore.database.relational

Class SynchronizedQuery<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.nyaa.nyaacore.database.relational.SynchronizedQuery<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the table type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Query<T>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SynchronizedQuery.NonTransactionalQuery, SynchronizedQuery.TransactionalQuery
    public abstract class SynchronizedQuery<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Query<T>
    Synchronously working on the given connection
